1241630.name: Super Console Kid
1241630.description:
Glitch out of reality! Master rocket-powered jumps, dashes, and rolls to save your town from pixelized foes bursting from busted game consoles in this bonkers 2D action adventure!

Features:

  • Enjoy a blend of exploration, platforming, and enemy encounters.
  • Find secrets, collectible items, and fulfil the objectives of each area.
  • Explore the city in between adventures.
  • Interact with a colorful cast of characters and obtain key items to help you on your journey.
  • Collect power-ups you can equip to greatly enhance your abilities.
  • Jump on enemies to deal maximum damage and create combos.
  • Use your "Pocket M8" companion to blast away foes with powerful weapons.
1241630.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
